title: It's Hard to Put in Zombie Contacts: Behind the Scenes at IGN
description:
IGN's working on a new zombie project, and I -- Greg Miller -- am a zombie in it. Watch me struggle with zombie contacts. 

SHARE/LIKE/SUBSCRIBE

Then, follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/gameovergreggy 

Download Daemon's song: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorbeam/id426986325
